title: Calories in a Mini Avocado
meta_description: Discover calories in mini avocado, including full nutrition breakdown like fat, fiber, protein, and easy tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Edible flesh only, approximately 50g; ripe Hass variety, raw, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, size, and growing conditions. Check labels or sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One mini avocado (50g flesh) provides ~80 kcal, mostly from healthy fats, with 3g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in mini avocado?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for one mini avocado (50g edible flesh).

faqs.q: Is a mini avocado low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, ~4.3g carbs total, with 3.4g fiber, netting ~0.9g digestible carbs.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in mini avocado?
faqs.a: Approximately 7.4g total fat, mostly monounsaturated healthy fats.

faqs.q: How much fiber in a mini avocado?
faqs.a: Around 3.4g dietary fiber, supporting digestion and satiety.
Yes; mini (50g) is ~80 kcal, while a full medium avocado (136g) is ~220 kcal.
